solution_line_template: The block has {servings_per_block} servings and he has eaten {servings_eaten} servings leaving {servings_per_block}-{servings_eaten} = <<{servings_per_block}-{servings_eaten}={servings_left}>>{servings_left} servings of cheese

There are {servings_left} servings of cheese left and each serving is {calories_per_serving} calories for a total of {servings_left}*{calories_per_serving} = <<{servings_left}*{calories_per_serving}={calories_remaining}>>{calories_remaining} calories
